name: Bungee Thief
description:
Deep in the night you are trying to rob the biggest bank in the city full of coins. Because of the tight security you can only enter it through the ceiling. So you've got the idea to rope down. 

But watch out - the spinning razor blades will kill you if you don't pay attention!

Get the highest score by picking up as many coins as possible and secure your loot by returning before it's too late. There is always the urge to go down a little bit deeper to steal even more money, but that might cost you your life!

Controls: 

- use arrow keys (<- and ->) to move left and right

- use space to return safely (if you get killed you lose your score so don't forget to use this!)
